basics.name: Anand Chikkegowdappa
basics.label: Services Engineer
basics.summary: Seeking a challenging and exciting job in a growth oriented industry were my potential for hard work and skills will be fully utilized

location.address: 35,11TH cross road Kurubarahalli road, Muneshwara layout Laggere

work.name: COSCHARIS Group
work.summary: Working as the Head General Goods. Started as a Technical for TVS Motorbikes. Service Centre manager looking after bike repair and servicing, spare parts, and customer service.
highlights: Headed the General Goods Division handling Motorbikes, air conditioners, television.

work.name: Nirma International (U) LTD
work.summary: Managed repair and servicing of TVS Motorbikes. Handled spare parts and customer service. Managed workshop activities and service certificates.

work.name: Zen Motors
work.summary: Worked in the Service Department of the Company looking after the Services before and after the Sales of TVS Company Motorbikes. Looked after the Sales of TVS Motorbikes in addition to Services. Also, was looking after the Spares of TVS Motorbikes.
